title: Shopify Developer
job_overview:
Job Title: Shopify Developer
Location: Remote
Job Type: Contract (Flexible)
Salary: Competitive, based on experience

About Us:
We’re an ambitious eCommerce team building modern, high-converting online stores. We’re looking for a Shopify Developer who can take ownership of development tasks, from custom theme development to app integrations and performance optimizations. If you’re passionate about building beautiful, scalable eCommerce experiences on Shopify, we’d love to work with you.

Key Responsibilities:
 • Build, customize, and maintain Shopify themes
 • Implement new features and functionality based on project requirements
 • Integrate third-party apps and APIs with Shopify stores
 • Optimize store speed, performance, and SEO
 • Troubleshoot bugs, test features, and ensure cross-browser compatibility
 • Collaborate closely with designers, marketers, and other developers
 • Set up Shopify Plus, custom checkout flows, and scripts (if applicable)

Requirements:
 • Proven experience developing Shopify stores (with portfolio examples)
 • Strong proficiency in Liquid, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Shopify’s API
 • Familiarity with Shopify CLI, Git, and theme development best practices
 • Ability to build responsive designs and pixel-perfect implementations
 • Understanding of eCommerce conversion best practices
 • Comfortable working with Figma/Adobe XD designs

Nice to Have:
 • Experience with Shopify Plus
 • App development or experience with Shopify Functions
 • Knowledge of Headless Shopify (Hydrogen, Remix)
 • Understanding of analytics, CRO, and A/B testing tools

What We Offer:
 • 100% remote work with flexible hours
 • Engaging projects in a fast-moving environment
 • Collaborative, respectful team culture
 • Opportunities for professional growth and leadership

To Apply:
Send your resume, portfolio, and a short intro about your experience . Please include links to live Shopify stores you’ve worked on and describe your role in each.
